post.title: Global online platforms show AI limitations and biases in knowledge production capabilities
post.excerpt: Global online platforms like Wikipedia reveal differences in knowledge production capabilities across language communities. Analysis shows that geopolitical factors strongly influence the structure of knowledge production, particularly for cultural and controversial topics, suggesting embedded biases within global datasets essential for artificial intelligence. In layman's terms, where you are will determine the knowledge that AI returns. https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.22271
